text.en: In essence you are the embodiment of all sources of refuge,
Gracious lama—Avalokiteśvara, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: lama chenré zik la solwa dep

text.en: Great compassionate one, grant your blessings!

text.en-trans: chenré zik kyi chin gyi lop

text.en: Protector of beings, grant your blessings!
Lord of the world, grant your blessings!
Supreme among Buddha's heirs, grant your blessings!
text.en-trans: gyalsé chok gi chin gyi lop

text.en: For me and all beings, my very own mothers,
text.en-trans: dak sok ma gen semchen tamché

text.en: Grant your blessings, so malice and savagery may be assuaged!
text.en-trans: ngen sem duk tsub zhiwar chin gyi lop

text.en: Grant your blessings, so intentions and actions are made virtuous!
text.en-trans: samjor gewar gyurwar chin gyi lop

text.en: Grant your blessings, so illness, harmful influences and obstacles are pacified!
text.en-trans: né dön barché zhiwar chin gyi lop

text.en: Grant your blessings, so misdeeds, obscurations, faults and downfalls are purified!
text.en-trans: dik drip nyé tung dakpar chin gyi lop

text.en: Grant your blessings, so we may master the supreme mind of bodhicitta!
text.en-trans: chang chub sem chok jongpar chin gyi lop

text.en: Grant your blessings, so we may carry out bodhisattva activity!
text.en-trans: gyalsé chö la jukpar chin gyi lop

text.en: Grant your blessings, so all our relationships become meaningful!
text.en-trans: dreltsé dön dang denpar chin gyi lop

text.en: Grant your blessings, so we may be reborn in the land of perfect bliss!
text.en-trans: dechen zhing du kyewar chin gyi lop

text.en: Grant your blessings, so we may attain buddhahood for others' sake!
text.en-trans: zhen dön sangyé drubpar chin gyi lop
